game.name: DopePie Survivors 3D
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: *DopePie Survivors 3D* is a 3D shooting game with survivor-like mechanics! Countless different little girls, giant corrupted female bosses, and a variety of weapons! Skills! Building! Piloting helicopters and tanks! Gliding through the city! can you lead them to escape?
game.shortDescriptionEn: *DopePie Survivors 3D* is a 3D shooting game with survivor-like mechanics! Countless different little girls, giant corrupted female bosses, and a variety of weapons! Skills! Building! Piloting helicopters and tanks! Gliding through the city! can you lead them to escape?
